alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Beaver; Butler; Clarion; Lawrence; Mercer; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT THE AREA THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 617 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles west of Knox to near Slippery Rock to 6 miles west of Oakwood. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Castle, Grove City, Rimersburg, Ellwood City, Shanor-Northvue, Slippery Rock, New Wilmington, Oakwood, New Castle Northwest, Big Beaver, New Beaver, and Ellport. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 12. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 93 and 113. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 28 and 50. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 6 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Beaver; Butler; Clarion; Lawrence; Mercer; Venango
